snippet: The organizers of the concert, set for late August outside Albany, hope to find support and money among country music fans.
abstract: Group of gun rights supporters and other grass-roots organizations in New York announce Freedompalooza, concert to raise money for nonprofit advocacy group Freedom Coalition; organizers hope Albany-area event will help them to find support among country music fans and energize voters who support candidates more sympathetic to gun rights and lower taxes.
lead_paragraph: The organizers of the concert, set for late August outside Albany, hope to find support and money among country music fans.

headline.main: New York Gun Rights Group Plans Freedompalooza
headline.print_headline: Gun Group to Hold Concert As Part of Fund-Raising Push

keywords.value: New York State Rifle and Pistol Assn
keywords.name: organizations
